scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=@homie/shared && npm run build --workspace=@homie/backend && npm run build --workspace=@homie/frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=@homie/backend && npm run test --workspace=@homie/frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=@homie/backend && npm run lint --workspace=@homie/frontend
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist frontend/dist shared/dist data/*.db node_modules/.cache
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m "chore(release): %s" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m "chore(release): %s" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m "chore(release): %s" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:prerelease: npm version prerelease --preid=rc -m "chore(release): %s" && git push && git push --tags
